metadata.title: Quinoa Dosa-No Fermentation Dosa- Healthy Instant Crispy Dosa- Indian Crepe Recipe
metadata.description:
Healthy & Nutritious Quinoa Dosa. No fermentation required, dosa made instantly.
ðŸ‘‰Full recipe on the blog: https://bit.ly/3znBv4Y
**Recipe
Quinoa- 1 cup
Oats- 1/2 cup
Moong dal- 1/2 cup
Red lentil- 1/2 cup
Urad dal or black gram- 1/2 cup
Chana dal- 1/2 cup

[00:00:16.000] very popular dish in south india
